articles.author: Shade Metibogun
articles.title: Mabel Makun Breaks Down During Mum's Burial, Friend Recounts Deceased's Ordeal: "She Fought so Hard"
articles.description: A video has captured how Mabel Makun broke down while she was burying her late mother. She wept and many tried to comfort her. Her friend shared a testimony.
